model

Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Comment

  • public class Comment
extends java.lang.Object
    A Comment object which contains the title,id,text,location,a picture may attached,time posted ,a userName which published this comment, and all of it's reply's comment id.
    Author:
    xuping

    • Constructor Detail

      • Comment

        public Comment(java.lang.String title,
       java.lang.String text,
       Location location,
       Bitmap picture,
       java.lang.String userName)
        Construct a Comment object with given parameters as attribute.
        Parameters:
        title - : a String which is the title of the comment.
        text - : a String which is the content of the comment.
        location - : a Location object which is the location of this comment.
        picture - : which is the attached picture of this comment(Bitmap).
        userName - : a String which is the userName of the author.
